NoraMaarCanonicalEntities.Purpose: A list of canonical entities in Nora Maar's world. Unlike Klark Kent, Nora's world is grounded in real-world locations and concepts.

Entity.Name: Hudson, NY
Entity.Description: The location of Nora's studio. A small city in upstate New York known for its vibrant arts scene.

Entity.Name: The Unseen Listener
Entity.Description: The unnamed recipient of Nora's video essays. A renowned artist and her former partner, who is skeptical of AI.
